channel.title: A few questions(Need Help)
channel.description:
===Need some Help with the following questions=== 1.I Am using fr33sc4p3 pkz source,I need a compiler.I have a compiler that says I don't have jdk when I do blah blah.
2.How do you change the max hit of magic spells?
3.How do u save spawned npcs into your server so when you log back on you can train on them etc.
4.I wanna make like a secret Admin Island.I need some co-ordinates and help on that.
5.I need to Add admin Island On the emotes tab,And you need character rights of 2 or above to go there.
6.How Can I add Npcs that sell stuff.I wanna spawn like a Lets say shopkeeper from a gen store,I wanna add all my own items to there.

item.title: A few questions(Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

For the magic max hit, there should be two ice bursts. One with magicID and one with spellID. Change the hitDiffs on both of them.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions(Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

Thanks for the help guys,I need help changing max hit of ice burst this is what i played around with
Old(default)-startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(24);

new-startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(700);

Does no effect =(

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions(Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

Well, it said it compiled with success.
The best way to test that is to change the Welcomemsg you get when logging in into your server.
Then compile it and if the msg changed that your compiler works.
If that did not work then you will probebly need to update your JDK becouse it isnt up to date or not workingcorreclty.
Go to sun.java.comto update/download new java JDK
When downloading download Java JDK 6update 2 and JRE could be usefull to to make some clientworking.

~Joery

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions(Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

Try my shop tutorial…
part 1 works for spawning NPC’s

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,180290.0.html

hope this helps

  • toonshorty

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions(Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

When I compile, I get this.Is this good or bad? Error occurred during initialization of VM
java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions(Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

Well, i dont know how to change magic hits becousei havent done magic yet.

But for a compiler use this one.

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac" *.java
pause

If it still not works go to your program files folder and then klick on java klick on you JDK folder then on that folder there is a folder called Bin.
And replace it with the path in the compiler.

For a list with some usefull coords you could look here.

  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,169143.0.html

To add NPC’s simpy open up AutoSpawns.cfg
and you will find out how to add them.
Add your shopkeepers in there also

To make a shop open up sops.cfg
and add your shop in there.
You will find out how to do it yourself.
Dont forget to remember the shop ID becouse you will have to add it in your client.java

do add the shop in client.java just look for

WanneShop = 1;

in your client.java and scroll down to the last one.
under it add

else if (NPCID == NPC ID HERE) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = SHOP ID HERE; }

Then just compile restart your server and done.

Read full topic
